page.title: 09ROE FARM COMMUNITY CENTRE
page.content: The{Roe Farm Community Centre}has now been open for seven years it is for anyone in the area to use. It caters for all ages from the mother and baby club to the senior citizens' meeting. The{Centre's activities}include: A pre-school playgroup A junior scheme and youth club The mother and baby club Roller skating Ladies' netball Gymnastics Ladies' keep fit Chaddo Imperials Carnival Band Football Bingo Boxing Senior citizens' meetings The Centre has its own kitchen, whilst outside there are games court and an adventure playground.
